available-languages.label: Available Languages
available-languages.description: Sets the languages that are available for all channels. Individual channels can then support a subset of these languages.

stock-threshold.label: Global out-of-stock threshold
stock-threshold.description: Sets the stock level at which this a variant is considered to be out of stock. Using a negative value enables backorder support. Can be overridden by product variants.

track-inventory.label: Track inventory by default
track-inventory.description: When tracked, product variant stock levels will be automatically adjusted when sold
